2.1.6. Lab – SSO & HTTP Header¶

In this section you will configure two SSO methods. You will first configure basic authentication SSO and then header authentication

2.1.6.1. Task – Create a HTTP basic SSO object¶

.

  1. Check Enable Single Sign-On

  1. Enter the name BASIC_SSO
  2. Verify HTTP Basic is selected
  3. Select Create New from the SSO Configuration Object dropdown box

  1. Verify the Username Source is session.sso.token.last.username
  2. Verify the Password Source is session.sso.token.last.password
  3. Click Save

  1. Verify the BASIC_SSO object was created
  2. click* Save & Next
